item.title: Xiaomi Mi 6X (wayne)
item.description: Make a backup now, as your device will be wiped. 0. Download the needed files and tools Droidian rootfs and devtools for arm64 (nightly releases include devtools) Android 9 Pie Firmware Vendor (has arb4 firmware!) Latest TWRP image Latest adaptation zip 1. Device preparation A USB 2.0 port/hub with an actual USB 2.0 controller is recommended (Using fastboot on a USB 3.0 port may cause errors with some Xiaomi devices) Save your APN (Android) The Access Point Name or APN can be found in the Settings menu of Android Take a piece of paper or a text editor, and write down everything that you see on that screen These are likely to include a URL (e.
